allow: Bash(".\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import pandas as pd; df = pd.read_excel\(''Exercise Threshold Classifications.xlsx'', sheet_name=''Activities Thresholds_Rev2''\); row_30 = df.iloc[30]; print\(''5km run classifications:''\); print\(row_30[[''Activity'', ''VO2 Max \(ml/kg/min\)'', ''FEV1 \(% predicted\)'', ''STS Power \\nw/kg'', ''HbA1c \(%\)'', ''HOMA IR'', ''Gait Speed \(m/s\)'', ''Body Fat %'', ''ApoB \(g/L\)'', ''hsCRP \(mg/L\)'', ''TUG \(sec\)'', ''Single Leg Stance \(sec\)'']]\)")

Bash(".\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "import pandas as pd; df = pd.read_excel\(''out/persona_activity_report.xlsx'', sheet_name=''Victor_56''\); print\(''Victor_56 - 5km run analysis:\\n''\); print\(df[df[''Activity''] == ''5km run''][[''Activity'', ''5 Year Critical Failures'', ''5 Year Supporting Failures'', ''5 Year Final Status'']].to_string\(index=False\)\); print\(''\\n\\nFull 5 year data:''\); five_year_row = df[df[''Activity''] == ''5km run'']; print\(''Critical:'', five_year_row[''5 Year Critical Failures''].values[0]\); print\(''Supporting:'', five_year_row[''5 Year Supporting Failures''].values[0]\); print\(''Status:'', five_year_row[''5 Year Final Status''].values[0]\):*)
